Creating the Model
```{r}
logit.model = glm(y ~ . -Amount -Avg, family = 'binomial', data = income_cat)
summary(logit.model)
plot(logit.model)

sum(round(exp(predict(logit.model, income_cat))/(1+exp(predict(logit.model, income_cat)))) == income_cat$y)/length(income_cat$y)
```

